title: CondaError: CondaHTTPError When conda install -c soumith magma-cuda80=2.1.0
body_html:
➜ ~ conda install -c soumith magma-cuda80=2.1.0
Fetching package metadata .............
Solving package specifications: .

Package plan for installation in environment /home/qichaotang/Code_Tools/anaconda2:

The following NEW packages will be INSTALLED:

magma-cuda80: 2.1.0-5 soumith

Proceed ([y]/n)? y

magma-cuda80-2 100% |################################| Time: 0:01:00 355.50 kB/s

CondaError: CondaHTTPError: HTTP None None for url https://conda.anaconda.org/soumith/linux-64/magma-cuda80-2.1.0-5.tar.bz2
Elapsed: None

An HTTP error occurred when trying to retrieve this URL.
HTTP errors are often intermittent, and a simple retry will get you on your way.

CondaError: CondaHTTPError: HTTP None None for url https://conda.anaconda.org/soumith/linux-64/magma-cuda80-2.1.0-5.tar.bz2
Elapsed: None

An HTTP error occurred when trying to retrieve this URL.
HTTP errors are often intermittent, and a simple retry will get you on your way.

CondaError: CondaHTTPError: HTTP None None for url https://conda.anaconda.org/soumith/linux-64/magma-cuda80-2.1.0-5.tar.bz2
Elapsed: None

An HTTP error occurred when trying to retrieve this URL.
HTTP errors are often intermittent, and a simple retry will get you on your way.

So whether the other way can be done by installing magma-cuda80?

body:
➜  ~ conda install -c soumith magma-cuda80=2.1.0
Fetching package metadata .............
Solving package specifications: .

Package plan for installation in environment /home/qichaotang/Code_Tools/anaconda2:

The following NEW packages will be INSTALLED:

    magma-cuda80: 2.1.0-5 soumith

Proceed ([y]/n)? y

magma-cuda80-2 100% |################################| Time: 0:01:00 355.50 kB/s


CondaError: CondaHTTPError: HTTP None None for url <https://conda.anaconda.org/soumith/linux-64/magma-cuda80-2.1.0-5.tar.bz2>

HTTP errors are often intermittent, and a simple retry will get you on your way.

HTTP errors are often intermittent, and a simple retry will get you on your way.
